Table of Contents

Class SelectedFileService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Concrete
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Class handling list of SelectedFile objects associated with the .md files used during merge, whose paths are stored as relative to connected main directory path.

Inheritance: BaseService<T> -> BaseDirectoryService<T> -> RelativeFileService<T> -> SelectedFileService
Implements: ICRUDService<T>, IDirectoryService<T>, IEditFileService<T>, IRelativeFileService<T>, ISelectedFileService, IService<T> 

public sealed class SelectedFileService : RelativeFileService<ISelectedFile>, ISelectedFileService, IRelativeFileService<ISelectedFile>, IEditFileService<ISelectedFile>, IDirectoryService<ISelectedFile>, ICRUDService<ISelectedFile>, IService<ISelectedFile>

Parameters

The object associated with the file to append.

The new line style, used in destination file.

UpdateTitle(int, string?)

Updates the title.

public int UpdateTitle(int id, string? title)

Parameters

id int

The identifier of object to update.

title string

The new title.

Returns

int

Identification number of updated item, or -1, if update failed (for example there are no item with specified id in the collection).
